title: HONOR POINTS AND RIBBONS?
body: So back when I was only new to LoL I was a little bit of a toxic player but never the less I've learnt my lesson. You need your team and abusing them will only make them play worse and feel bad. So, I lost my honor points a year ago and since then I haven't earned the ribbons back despite gaining them back again. Is it possible to get the ribbons again after losing all the honor points? Or is that part of the punishment for toxic behavior?

replies.body: I'm not sure if you can get ribbons after losing honour point but one thing I do know is that, in order to get a ribbon in the first place, you need to *consistently* get honoured. Basically it's not about how many points you get but how often you get them.
I know people that have 600+ points and don't even have a ribbon, the system is %%%% and broken.

> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wMukJJLl,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-10T04:38:31.230+0000)
>
> 

No you can get them at 14 honours, in order to keep them you need to be honoured continuously.

You get a ribbon if you are in the top 20%  for receiving honors from games. I'll quote Lyte on this:

"To get a ribbon right now, you have to be in the top 20% of your server in terms of honors received per game from *strangers.* It's pretty straight-forward, but you can see why a system like this tends to benefit Co-op vs Bots and ARAM players where games are generally lower stakes and friendlier on average."
thats how i got my ribbon, 550 games in co-op vs ai, and over 1000 games in aram.
Honestly, honor points mean nothing, once you reach lvl 30 and start playing ranked people could not care less about them. Just focus on your individual play and keep trying to improve.
High elo ppl get excited when they find out i have a ribbon.

Yeah this is true I had team mate that had ribbon of great team meat and in game he was toxic as %%%%! Yeah no one cares about the ribbons doesn't really mean much =/

i have had my ribbon for 7 months and counting, i have been toxic, i haven't lost it so toxicity has no effect on it, it all depends, the ribbons aren't just have 500 teamwork, for example i was told by one of rioters, that it is a combination of 2 types of honors, for teamwork you need helpful and teamwork quite frequently

I seriously have no idea if there is an actual amount to get, but I got mine back when I was level 9 and I have had them ever since. Never lost them, and I have just over 100 honours for team work and 50 honours for friendly. I seriously have no idea how it works.
I'm at 200+ for Teamwork and 100+ for Honorable but I lost my badge at like 150 teamwork
at the start of each year i usuallyy lose my ribbons but  earn them back by mid year
